w21zs849zw.name: Kassim Mosque
w21zs849zw.remarks: Combining both modern and Islamic architecture, this spanking new masjid was rebuilt to replace an old one built way back in 1924. Completed in 1999, the four-storey masjid located in the East can accommodate up to 2000 people. It is linked to Wisma Indah, a wakaf complex which houses the masjidâ€™s office, commercial offices. Besides organizing regular religious courses for adults, the masjid also provides Internet facilities for visitors.
